content.text: As a Enabling solution squad, I want to show up only the variables used in the form request , so that will allow our operation have all the neceasary information to work in the request
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:
the RITM  need to show only the variables used or filled by the requestor instead

fields.summary: RITMS should show only the variables used in the Form request

is completed

All variables used in the form request need to be printed in the RITMS description

fields.summary: Add variable used in the form in the RITMS description

Title of the Notification need to be adjusted to reflect the correct message ->Marketplace Request Approved

content.text: e.g. target RDBM selected is not there.  EVERY field that is entered in the UI should show in the RITM.  every field NOT available to be entered in the UI, should not show up in the RITM.  if available in the UI, but optional should still show up in the RITM.
Also, fields like database Instance in the RITM are now required.  This field is not in the client facing UI and should not be shown in the RITM
The RITM has fields that do not have user behavior that is aligned to the request form

fields.summary: RITM created does not have request details

content.text: As a Enabling solution squad member, I want to set the correct configuration item, so hte task will have the correct configuration.
Acceptance Criteria
Functional Criteria:
Configuration item should be DBaaS Support(54133528db679f007ef6bae768961908) or DBaaS Professional Services(fc9811c3dbb23b8c83ce9334ca9619b1)
Owning IT Service should be the same as CI

fields.summary: Enhance the workflow so that TASKS have the correct "Configuration Item" (DBaaS Support or DBaaS Professional Services) and "Owning IT Service" (same as Configuration ITem)
